Recipe.title: Dutch Oven Fruit Crispy
Recipe.Source: One of the simplest and most well known dessert recipes for Dutch Ovens.
Recipe.Description: A simple dessert that tastes good, but takes very little preparation.

section.instruction: Line Dutch Oven with foil and grease bottom and sides.
Pour cans of Fruit, including juice and spread across bottom of Dutch Oven.
Sprinkle Cake Mix evenly over the Fruit.
Slice the Butter as thinly as possible and place evenly over Cake Mix.
Bake very slowly, only from the top (≈6-8 charcoal briquettes), until top is golden brown and the Fruit is starting to bubble. (Determine approximate time.)
